video.title: Yakari
video.synopsis: This animated series follows a young Sioux named Yakari who's blessed with the special gift of being able to communicate with the animal kingdom.

episodes.synopsis: Yakari goes looking for the wild pony that all the tribesmen want to catch. / An angry female puma thwarts Yakari's plans to ride Little Thunder.
episodes.title: Yakari and Great Eagle / Yakari and Little Thunder

episodes.synopsis: Little Thunder runs off and vows never to return when Yakari asks him to run one race too many. / Yakari mediates between a hunter and a wolf pack.
episodes.title: First Gallop / Yakari in the Land of the Wolves

episodes.synopsis: Yakari diverts a wolf pack to save a pregnant buffalo. / Yakari coaxes the forest animals to welcome a lost pelican and help him on his way.
episodes.title: Lords of the Plains / The Stranger

episodes.synopsis: Yakari has to save Slow Strider when a manipulative crow takes over his mind. / Yakari must confront one of the few animals he can't reason with.
episodes.title: Flight of the Crows / The Devil in the Woods

episodes.synopsis: When Wise One disappears in a tornado, Yakari and his father set out to look for him. / Yakari loses his memory after falling into the river.
episodes.title: The Raging Sky / The River of Sorrow

episodes.synopsis: Yakari fears his totem is to blame when an eagle injures one of the tribe's hunters and steals his talisman. / Yakari helps a trapped beluga whale.
episodes.title: White Fleece / The Cloud Blower

episodes.synopsis: Yakari must drain the lake to save little Linden. / When a rascally squirrel promises to teach a wolverine to fly, it spells trouble for Yakari.
episodes.title: The Lake Monster / Revenge of the Wolverine

episodes.synopsis: Troublemaking little beaver Linden and Yakari find themselves trapped in an underground cave. / Yakari teaches a ferocious grizzly bear a lesson.
episodes.title: Yakari Visits the Beavers / Yakari and the Grizzly

episodes.synopsis: To defend two moose, Yakari and Rainbow must find the courage to take on an aggressive predator. / Yakari and Little Thunder track horse thieves.
episodes.title: Stuck on an Island / The Wall of Fire

episodes.synopsis: A clever coyote helps Yakari save Buffalo Seed, who's trapped in a cave and being watched by a cougar. / Yakari rescues a bear cub stuck in a burrow.
episodes.title: Yakari and the Coyote / The Great Burrow

episodes.synopsis: Yakari starts an avalanche to move a boulder that's diverting water from the river. / Yakari teaches a lost little coyote the basics of survival.
episodes.title: Yakari and the Condor / A Coyote with No Name

episodes.synopsis: To satisfy Yakari's curiosity, Great Eagle puts him into a strange sleep that takes him to prehistoric times. / Little Thunder befriends a gray horse.
episodes.title: The Mystery of the Cliff Face / Little Thunder's Secret

episodes.synopsis: When he can't find Little Thunder as the tribe prepares to migrate, Yakari gets help from a snake with a secret. / Yakari aids a rare white bear.
episodes.title: Rainbow the Snake / Yakari and the Ghost Bear

episodes.synopsis: Rainbow masquerades as a boy to prove she's as good at fishing as her male friends. / Restful Rock and Buffalo Seed open Yakari's mind to the trees.
episodes.title: The Unknown Fisherman / The Talking Oak

episodes.synopsis: Disaster hits after Buffalo Seed leads his friends into a desert that brings bad luck. / Yakari investigates when Wise One's medicine bag is stolen.
episodes.title: The Strange Pony / The Flying Thief

episodes.synopsis: Yakari tries to stop Buffalo Seed from helping Quick Bow kill a great white wolf. / Yakari teaches a mute hunter the sign language of prairie tribes.
episodes.title: Buffalo Seed Runs Away / Long Bow

episodes.synopsis: Yakari and Rainbow decide to get a present for Straight Gaze. / Yakari attempts to return a lost medicine bag to its rightful owner.
episodes.title: The Singing Branch / The Spirit Mask

episodes.synopsis: Yakari learns that Little Thunder has a secret wild friend who's terrified of people. / Yakari tries to decipher the pictograms in Wise One's tepee.
episodes.title: Like the Wind / The Sacred Stone

episodes.synopsis: During a fishing competition, Yakari gets mad at Buffalo Seed. / Yakari must find Restful Rock's flute after the tribe's waggish old dog buries it.
episodes.title: Friends for Life / The Lost Flute

episodes.synopsis: Yakari and Buffalo Seed are in charge of finding a new spot for the tribe to set up camp for the winter. / Yakari has trouble keeping his promises.
episodes.title: The Moon Spirit / A Promise Is a Promise

episodes.synopsis: Yakari's bear cub friend Honeycomb comes to him for help. / Yakari and Rainbow run into a pack of trouble while they're out collecting firewood.
episodes.title: Yakari and the Angry Bear / The Incredible Rescue

episodes.synopsis: Restful Rock is challenged to a competition when his comment insults a proud Sioux. / Yakari must find a special plant to cure ailing Speedy Turtle.
episodes.title: Restful Rock's Challenge / The Prairie Starflower

episodes.synopsis: Yakari helps a wolf gain the strength and confidence he needs to rejoin his pack. / Quick Bow tries to exploit Yakari's special talent to communicate.
episodes.title: Cringing Wolf / White Fur

episodes.synopsis: Yakari is shocked when he tails the listless Eyes-Always-Shut on his nightly excursions. / Yakari follows a pair of bright yellow eyes to a dark cave.
episodes.title: The Sleepwalker / Mysterious Eyes

episodes.synopsis: Yakari and Little Thunder help an old buffalo catch up to his herd. / In the grip of a fever, Yakari relives a fable about the creation of the Sioux.
episodes.title: The Old Buffalo / Son of the Eagle

episodes.synopsis: When Long Bow returns, he and Yakari set out to find a gigantic mustang for the gentle giant. / Yakari helps a friend pass the trial of the red arrow.
episodes.title: The Big Mustang / The Red Arrow
